extendedInfo.description: Flashcard style learning tool for learning the top 100 or 200 pharmaceuticals.Very useful for pharmacy students and pharmacy techs.These drugs are likely to appear on PTCB/ExCPT exams. Features:Choose either the top 100 or top 200 drugs.Bookmark drugs for later review.Choose to be prompted for either brand or generic names.Bonus:Includes Drugs.com top 100 Q3 2013 drugs by units sold.July 2013 Top 100/200 Drugs by Ezra Burgoyne
